lines:
Guy L'Guy: Hail, young adventurer!
I am Guy L'Guy, a helpful golden chanterelle!
Fungus McShroom: We've met before, Guile.
Guy L'Guy: Guile's my brother. I'm Guy L'Guy.
Fungus McShroom: Guile Guy. As I said.
Guy L'Guy: Guile's my brother. I'm Guy L'Guy.
Fungus McShroom: Okay then. Who are you?
Guy L'Guy: I already told you. I'm Guy L'Guy.

Fungus McShroom: I have no idea why I asked a mushroom who,
in the last three sentences, told me their name thrice.

Guy L'Guy: You seem confused.
Maybe a magic spell will shed some light on the situation?
Fungus McShroom: That sounds great, what can you teach me?

Guy L'Guy: I can teach you how to shoot
a single magic mycelium missile or how to move faster.
Fungus McShroom: Teach me the Mycelium Missile. I'm more of a long-distance fighter.

Guy L'Guy: Don't forget to move while you shoot!
Else, you might just shoot south!
Fungus McShroom: I like to get up close and personal. Help me move fast!
Guy L'Guy: Are you planning on leaving so soon?
Guy L'Guy: Hello, Fungus! What can I do for you?

options.text: Can you teach me another spell?
How do you know my name?
How do you spell your name?

lines: Fungus McShroom: How do you know my name?
Guy L'Guy: Guile told me.
Fungus McShroom: Guile had no chance seeing you before me!
Guy L'Guy: We communicate chemically through the ground.
Fungus McShroom: Chemical communication? What are you, a plant?
Fungus McShroom: Where are we?

Guy L'Guy: We're in the south of Castle Cakeworld,
directly to the east of the Chocolate Cave.
Fungus McShroom: How do you spell your name?
Guy L'Guy: Guy L'Guy.
Fungus McShroom: Can you teach me another spell?
Guy L'Guy: No.
Fungus McShroom: Can't you or won't you?
Guy L'Guy: If I tell you, will you stop asking questions?
Fungus McShroom: No.
Guy L'Guy: All right!
Fungus McShroom: Yes.

Guy L'Guy: I could teach you all kinds of spells,
but a higher power prevents me from doing so.

Guy L'Guy: There, I told you.
Now hold your end of the promise: No more questions!

options.text: Tell me how you know my name.

lines: Fungus McShroom: Tell me where we are.
Fungus McShroom: Tell me how you know my name.
Guy L'Guy: This is technically a question!

Fungus McShroom: Do you realize I'm going
to bug you until you answer my questions?
